title: A few questions and personal overview of boards. :^)
body:
Dear ~~Reddit~~ Boards, I have come to the conclusion (from reading some of the latest posts) that boards is pretty much complaining and match history pics. Of course, the occasional Q&A from a Riot employee to attract attention, which is fair enough. I propose a different topic from the norm, a few questions to learn about the people inhabiting these boards.

Who is your favourite champion and why?

What brings you to the boards?

And who is your most hated champion apart from Riven, Nidalee, Lissandra, Vi, Lee sin, Zed and Teemo, because those champions seem to be the only ones people are complaining about, and I would like some unique responses.

I do not expect many responses because of this off topic post, but if you do view this feel free to reply. I am interested in the opinions of others.

:^)

replies.body:
My favourite champion seems to change each season, I get really addicted to playing someone different each time! Typically, I enjoy playing champions that make life awkward for the enemy laners, and force tough decisions to be made by the enemy. Here's my favourites and why!

Singed - The epitome of being annoying and forcing tough decisions. Just to be clear, the best option is always to  chase the singed. Always. 

Lulu - I love playing Lulu, as she seems to have unlimited options in most situations. I like that all of her abilities can be used in two separate ways, and how it's possible to frustrate assassins with the heal+shield / cc combo. I'm also a sucker for playing her in TT, with an auto-attack focused build with Nashor's and Lich Bane. It makes her a terrifying duelist with easy chases, big heals and lich bane procs!

Zyra - I love the turnarounds you can do on Zyra, and the sheer burst you can do from a support role. Her ability to control an area during a teamfight is pretty much un-matched, and her counter engage and punishing the enemy when overcommitted is pretty much second only to Janna. She's really satisfying to catch someone out with as a support!

Morgana - Morg has been one of my mains since back in Beta, because she's very flexible and pretty much always effective to play in any situation. I love that you can play her pretty much anywhere at the moment, and she'll be a solid pick regardless. Her scaling and tankiness (that passive is big!) is generally underrated, so you can pull off surprising turnarounds even when behind. 

(There's a few more here like Karma, Annie, Leona and Kayle, but I don't want to spam any more D:) 

*What brings me to the boards?*

 Discussions like this! I love talking about League any chance I can get. :D

*Most hated champion?*

Not sure on this one! I still hold some completely irrational resentment towards Xin Zhao, Lee Sin and Akali from soon after they were released. For some reason, I've never been able to handle laning against a Blitzcrank unless I'm playing Morgana, so I guess that's probably my answer!

I feel you on the Blitzcrank! 
For me it's because it doesn't matter how many pulls you dodge, that ONE PULL can change a fight and in some cases the game.

Who is your favourite champion and why? I have to answers to this.

Firstly, my overall favourite champion is Anivia. I have played her forever. I think she is a great champion and greatly underplayed in comparison to others. In addition my favourite animal is a Snowy Owl and Anivia is the closest thing to that. 
Secondly, my favourite champion is also Thresh because of the diversity and play making abilities in his kit. I believe Thresh is the best support there is purely because of what he can achieve. 

What brings you to the boards?

I first transitioned onto the boards when it came out. I have been on the original forums since the server came out. Back on the old forums I was pretty much a troll and a heavy necro. When boards came out I took it as an opportunity to reinvent myself and help the community on here by trying to answer as many of their problems and inquiries as I can if I can get to them before a Red. It is because of this reinventing of myself that I have been recognized by Marauder and Mirkinen etc. Whilst I do indulge in the odd troll post/comment I do still try my best to answer peoples problems if I can.

I like Thresh as he provides TONS of cc and his Lantern (W) can rescue allies from tough situations.

Most hated champion would be Vi, complete bs damage.

I used to be on Forums. I first joined because i wanted problems fixed and when i heard about Forums i joined.

Hello Niko, 

First off thanks for the fun post!

My name is Skyprus and the main reason I come to the boards it because I absolutely love this games and like to use them as my opportunity to give back to the game. I try to linger around and help out where I can, I love trying to share my knowledge and ideas for the game. I also love the Rioter's interaction with boards, its a nice feeling to have a Rioter respond directly  to your questions or thoughts. I also would one day to a massive chronicle of League strategy. I know I'm very far off but an confident that I will be able to learn every thing about this game. I want to be able to run a game down to the micro level in my mind accounting for everything single tiny thing. It will take time but I'm confident I'll be able to do it. I don't want to play off instinct, I want to play off  knowledge. :)

On to the other questions; 

My favourite champion is Karthus.
To put it nicely I am mechinally inept Lol player.
Karthus' kit is quite simple. Spammable AOE :). Easy combo.
The most skill you need is death positioning and flashing in and dying is something that fits right into my skillset.
I also love the power that comes from ulting MWAHAHAHAhaha

As to my least favourite champion; Le Blanc.
Purely because of the classic; can't play her or outplay her.

Thanks for reading, 
Skyprus

favourite champion: tryndamere; because he is extremely thrilling to play with his ult. same thing with rengar, but since they added the markers on his ult its useless almost unless they are running toward you out of stupidity (never happens really), kinda defeats the purpose of stealth if they are aware of you.

most hated champion: karthus; simply because of his power bubbles. %%%%s me up.

why i come to boards: usually for news updates, sometimes there's interesting content around, and of course i want to get a feel of what the communities mood is

^ Thanks for being the first reply.

I find rengar kind of boring to play unless you are a god at him, his ult feels like your aren't even invisible with that indicator. As for tryndamere, one of my friends has a full crit page and it's hilarious to watch him level 1 duel the enemy :D

Unfortunately, I haven't gotten around to playing Karthus, nor have I seen him played in about 100 games. He is 2nd on my next champ to buy list though. His q got changed to do more damage when isolated, right? That must be a pain to deal with  :/

*Who is your favourite champion and why?*

I've got 2 at the moment. Karthus and Vel'Koz. I just like the idea of dealing a ton of damage to everyone, and both their ults are rally satisfying to use.

There's also Shaco. I like his ability to ruin an enemy all in (during laning phase) so easily.

*What brings you to the boards?*

Boredom mostly.  I really wish there wouldn't be as many 'LFT' posts... There's too many of them.

*And who is your most hated champion apart from Riven, Nidalee, Lissandra, Vi, Lee sin, Zed and Teemo, because those champions seem to be the only ones people are complaining about, and I would like some unique responses.*

Enemy Shacos. They keep ruining my all ins.

most favourite  champ would be {{champion:10}} / {{champion:89}} . i love how Kayle deals tons of mixed damage and shreds defences with her passive and that ult even with the cd nerfs its still good. Leona because of the cc soo much cc and makes it incredibly fun to save allies with her ulti and turning the fight with a win though i would love to see her passive change to allow her to be a solo laner as well or have her shield when it explodes apply a iron solari locket shield to allies. i know these changes would probably make her op but it would be fun to decide whether you want to shield allies from damage or engage and mass apply your passive :D

as to most hated its a tough choice between {{champion:105}}  and {{champion:55}} huge burst damage and not much counter play unless they make a mistake.

Quinn. Ever since I first played her I fell in love. I was terrible back then... But at least I've gotten better and can say I know how to play her reasonably well now. There's just something about the way she plays that makes me like using her.

*What brings you to the boards?*

This is the only socialisation that I get... I preferred the forums but boards is better than nothing.

*Most hated champion?*

Not Teemo, huh? That's a tough one. I'd have to say it's Sion.
